workExpList.company_name: China Shipbuilding Industry System Engineering Research Institute

projectList.project_desc: user order and payment system, docking and centralize thirdpart payment system, keep user order and transaction infomation and provider query for them, provider cafeteria and restaurant payment and refund logic Etc.
projectList.project_content: optimize related logic,sql query, fix bug, develop  some modules

projectList.project_desc: bills system , sync data from order  system, cleaning, transform,aggrgation for them and  display to platform users, reconcilation with thrirpart payment system, providing order and transaction dipsplay in many chart form, providing optionally field of report,store report and intermedia data in s3 and dynamodb, tech stack:  rds(postgres), dynamodb ,grpc,pulsar,s3

a golang library , generate a job that run in async,help users to deal with time consuming task,implement by a state mechine, store job in database, task run in order in a cluster, support config of fail strategy  such as rollback or retry,inject code in bussiness logic to keep trace of the  task,provider interface to query detail and status of task

a distributed dispatch system, a platform  that user config timingly job, like cloudwatch in aws, support trigger of http,rpc, or script, rely etcd to keep elect main node of of the spinner server, job surpport configuration of schduler strategy,  fail stratery , or enentry ,sheduler module implemented by timingwheel, target can be in single ec2 or k8s cluster

projectList.project_name: stategy development and scipt interact with chain
projectList.project_desc: have developed strategy such as arbitrage,penny jump ,scalp, martin and other tricky strategy, catch data from exchange to do some backtest, have developed script interact with blockchain such as monitor price and buy nft in gamefi market,move brick between defi and exchagne

aboutme.aboutme_desc:
① high interest in blockchain and encryption currency, highly adaptable and quick start to develop, i've develop trade strategy myself,developed script to interact with blockchain, I'v learn and traced some gamefi project,familiar with eth core mechanism, i have read through some contract,and eth undelying implement such as uniswapV3 and geth,know some basic algorithem and cryptography
② good coding habit and familiar with algotithem
③ familiar with tech stack  and toolchain in backend development
